posts.post_title: FS: Brown Chic PSA 5, Johnson Port PSA 3, Young Port PSA 3
posts.post_content:
Prices are below and are net to me.  If paying by G&S please add 3%.

Brown Chicago PSA 5 - $SOLD
Johnson Portrait PSA 3 - $SOLD
Young Portrait PSA 3 - $2250
Brown and Johnson sold..Nice looking Young Portrait still available
